description: Episode of Series "Lonely planet: the experience". Hosted by Justine Shapiro, this Lonely Planet video explores the subterranean tunnels once inhabited by the Vietcong, takes part in new years celebrations with fireworks heralding the arrival of a new year, takes alternative medicine- drinking snake juice to ward off sickness, and riding the Reunification express.
